item.title: Expierenced and Exceptional Java Developer (financial district)
item.description:
Title: An Expierenced and Exceptional Java Developer
Location: San Francisco, CA
Pay rate: Competitive + stock options
Length: Permanent

JOB DESCRIPTION:
Great upside opportunity for an exceptional Java Software Engineer in an emerging and innovative software company! (Financial District, San Francisco)

You will be a key contributor to a truly disruptive platform in the enterprise software space. We are at the forefront of technology and blazing new ground with a new software componentization technique called Service Oriented Programming (SOP) that enables the convergence of Service-Oriented Architecture, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) and Grid Virtualization. In the past few years, we have been successfully applying this innovative technology to solve challenging business problems.

We are looking for an energetic and highly-motivated extremely talented Java Software Engineer to join our fast paced team. This is a great opportunity to work on highly visible and customer-centric parts of the product. Candidate will be responsible for refining requirements, performing implementation, release and ongoing product support and testing.

KNOWLEDGE AND SKILL REQUREMENTS
* MS/BS in Computer Science or Computer Engineering or equivalent experience
* MUST HAVE a minimum of 7 years of professional software engineering experience in the full software development cycle
* MUST HAVE a minimum of 5 years of Java programming background building core components and Swing-based user-interfaces
* MUST HAVE been a core member of a highly successful product development team with major architectural and programming contributions
* Responsible for the maintenance of a large Java based system (3 years)
* Experience with programming highly robust and multi-threaded scalable applications is required
* Knowledge of application server configuration and setup such as: Tomcat, JBoss, WebLogic, and WebSphere.
* Platform experience with a variety of operating systems such as: Unix, Linux, & Windows
* Knowledge of Mantis or equivalent bug tracking system.
* Must be technically savvy and familiar with general computer configuration, network administration and tools.
* Experience managing software release and patch updates with customers.
* Experience working in a technical support role for a software platform and tool company is a plus.

GENERAL OPERATIONAL SKILLS
* Must be team-player with solid communication skills, strong time-management, creative problem solving skills and attention to detail
* Ability to directly work with and support customers
* Ability to work in a high pressure, deadline oriented, and fast paced environment
* Experience providing customer support to users over all mediums; email, web and telephone
* Must be a self-starter and able to work with minimal supervision
* Available for limited travel to deliver custom plug-ins and products within customer environments


This position will wear three hats: He/she will support our internal processes, support our external customers, and fix bugs and make enhancements in Java and successful candidate will ensure product issues requiring technical resolution are reproducible cases for the development team. Building relationships with the customers and keeping the customers informed of case status, product updates and other information will be a major part of this role. Other duties might apply when needed such as assisting with product builds and releases, QA and some minor IT tasks.

This position provides incredible growth possibilities working with innovative SOA standard-based technologies. Your competitive compensation package will include salary and stock options with exceptional potential to increase in value.

Easy access to office via BART and pubic transportation. Prestigious location and great work environment in the heart of San Francisco.

PLEASE SAVE BOTH YOUR TIME AND OUR TIME:
This is a fast paced and demanding environment. If youre not an exceptional, hardworking developer with excellent communication skills then this position wont be a good fit for you.
We need someone who is a 9 out of 10 or better in the following areas: JAVA Developer skills, Verbal and Written Communication Skills, Self Motivation/Self Starter, Hardworking.
If you do not rate yourself a 9 or better in these areas this job will not be the right fit. Were looking for a very special person.

TO APPLY: PLEASE READ THIS SECTION CAREFULLY!
Please send your resume, references, cover letter to the Craigslist address above.
Send your cover letter in the body of your email and your resume and references as a single Word attachment.
Your subject should read Exceptional Developer 
In the first line of your cover letter please answer the question Why are you the EXCEPTIONAL Java developer that were looking for? Please send your rating for the above skills (JAVA Devolper, Communication skills, etc.)
If you dont prove that youre detail oriented and follow ALL of the above directions you wont be considered. Thank you for your time and Good Luck!
